entry.title: The workplaces of the future will be more human, not less
entry.quote: In an age when the ability to think and learn, to process and reason take centre stage, the coming age of automation means that, in order to thrive in the modern workplace, we must become more human.

entry.title: “We’re in a diversity crisis”: cofounder of Black in AI on what’s poisoning algorithms in our lives
entry.quote: There is a bias to what kinds of problems we think are important, what kinds of research we think are important, and where we think AI should go. If we don’t have diversity in our set of researchers, we are not going to address problems that are faced by the majority of people in the world.
